original_text: They are to perform duties for him and for the whole community at the tent of meeting by doing the work of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 그들이 회막 앞에서 아론의 직무와 온 회중의 직무를 위하여 회막에서 시무하되

sentences.original_text: They are to perform duties for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 위해 직무를 수행해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: by doing the work of the tabernacle
